app.name: Authgear
email.authenticate-primary-oob.subject: 登入 {AppName}
email.authenticate-secondary-oob.subject: 登入 {AppName}
email.forgot-password.subject: 重設密碼指示
email.setup-primary-oob.subject: 登記 {AppName}
email.setup-secondary-oob.subject: 登記 {AppName}
email.verification.subject: 電郵地址驗證指示
email.welcome-message.subject: 歡迎！
enter-login-id-page-description--change: 你現在的{key, select, email {電郵地址} username {使用者名稱} other {電郵地址或使用者名稱}}是 {displayID}。請輸入新的{key, select, email {電郵地址} username {使用者名稱} other {電郵地址或使用者名稱}}。
enter-login-id-page-title--add: 輸入你的{key, select, email {電郵地址} username {使用者名稱} other {電郵地址或使用者名稱}}
enter-login-id-page-title--change: 更改你的{key, select, email {電郵地址} username {使用者名稱} other {電郵地址或使用者名稱}}
enter-totp-code-placeholder: 6-digit code from the authenticator app / device
enter-totp-description: Enter the 6-digit code you see in the authenticator app / device
error-blocked-user: Your account is blocked from login.
error-duplicated-authenticator: This authenticator already has been added.
error-duplicated-identity: 身份資料已被使用於另一帳號
error-invalid-credentials: 登入失敗，帳號資訊或密碼不正確
error-login-id-required: {variant, select, email {電郵地址} username {使用者名稱} other {電郵地址或使用者名稱}} 為必填
error-max-length: 字串長度須少於或等於{expected, plural, other{#個字}}
error-network: There is a problem with the network.
error-password-reset-failed: 該重設密碼鏈接已無效、已使用、或過期。請重新獲取一個新的鏈接。
error-rate-limited: 因偵測到過於頻繁的使用，此功能已被暫時停用。請稍侯片刻後重試。
error-remove-last-identity: 無法移除：你需要保留最少一個可用的登入方式
error-remove-last-primary-authenticator: Cannot remove. You need to keep at least 1 primary authenticator for an identity.
error-remove-last-secondary-authenticato: Cannot remove. Multi-factor authentication is required.
error-verification-code-invalid: Verification code is invalid, used or expired. Please request a new one.
error-web-ui-invalid-session-retry:
此頁面已失效 － 這可能是因為你此前在本頁停留太久或切換過瀏覽器。

請按返回並重試
error-web-ui-invalid-session-return: This page is no longer active. Please return to the current page.
forgot-password-email-description: Enter your email to request instruction to reset your password
forgot-password-phone-description: Enter your phone to request instruction to reset your password
forgot-password-send-to-email-descriptio: 我們將發送重設密碼之指示至以下電郵地址
forgot-password-send-to-phone-descriptio: 我們將發送重設密碼之指示至以下電話號碼
forgot-password-success-description: 如我們能確認你輸入的資訊, 重設密碼的資訊將會被發至 {target}，請按照相關提示重設你的帳號密碼。
forgot-password-success-page-title: 已收到重設密碼之要求
login-id-placeholder: {variant, select, email {電郵地址} username {使用者名稱} other {電郵地址或使用者名稱}}
no-device-tokens-description: No trusted devices that could skip MFA
oauth-branding-facebook: 使用 Facebook 帳戶登入
oauth-branding-google: 使用 Google 帳戶登入
oob-otp-description: 我們已發送一段 {length}位的認證碼到 {target}. 請輸入該認證碼後繼續下一步
oob-otp-send-description: Click next to get the code at {target}.
password-policy-lowercase: 請輸入最少一個小寫英文字母
password-policy-minimum-length: 最少 {length, plural, one{# character} other{# 位}}
password-policy-reuse: No reuse of {size, plural, one{# previous password} other{# previous passwords}} / previous password within {day, plural, one{# day} other{# days}}
password-policy-title: 你的密碼必須符合以下條件:
public-signup-disabled-notice: Please contact the system administrator for creating new accounts.
recovery-code-consumption-description: You can only use each code once
recovery-code-storage-description: Keep these recovery codes somewhere safe but accessible
reset-password-description: Please enter your new password below.
reset-password-success-description: You have successfully reset your password. You can now sign in with it.
return-page-description: Please return to where you were to continue. If you were interacting with an mobile app, please switch back to the app. If you were interacting with a website, please switch back to that tab.
settings-identity-description: 以下為可用的登入方式
settings-oob-otp-title: Channels for receiving verification code via SMS / Email
settings-page-mfa-section-description: 管理你的多重要素驗證器
settings-page-primary-password-descripti: 上次更新時間: {time, datetime, long}
settings-page-recovery-code-description: These codes allow you to sign in even you lost access to your apps, devices, phones or email accounts.
settings-page-secondary-password-descrip: 上次更新時間: {time, datetime, long}
settings-page-secondary-totp-title: 以驗證器應用程式 / 裝置獲取驗證碼
settings-page-security-section-descripti: 用於確保登入的是你本人
settings-sessions-description: 你目前在以下裝置登入
setup-totp-code-description: Enter the 6-digit code that you see in the app / device
setup-totp-fallback-description: Can''t scan the barcode? Choose Manual entry. Enter your email address and this key: {secret} Make sure that Time based is turned on
setup-totp-get-google-authenticator-desc: If you don''t have any authenticator device / app, you can get the Google Authenticator App from Google Play Store or Apple App Store
setup-totp-use-google-authenticator-desc: In the App select Set up account. Choose Scan barcode
sso-login-id-separator-oauth-present: 選擇以下一個選項以繼續
toc-pp-footer: 註冊即表示我已同意 條款和細則 及 隱私政策.
use-text-login-id-description: 使用 {variant, select, email {電郵地址} username {使用者名稱} other {電郵地址 or 使用者名稱}} 登入
verify-user-description: 我們已發送一段 {length}位的認證碼到 {target}. 請輸入該認證碼後繼續下一步
wechat-auth-with-app-description: Click the below button to continue WeChat Login
wechat-auth-with-qr-code-description: Please scan the QR code in your WeChat app to sign in.
